FuncDef: The display evpn mac routing-table limit command displays MAC address limits of EVPN instances.
CLIs: display evpn mac routing-table limit evpn-instance <vpn-instance-name>
display evpn mac routing-table limit all-evpn-instance

ParaDef.Info:
Displays MAC address limits of all EVPN instances.
-

Displays MAC address limits of an EVPN instance with the specified name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display evpn mac routing-table limit evpn-instance vpn1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the MAC address limits of EVPN instances, run the display evpn mac routing-table limit command. The MAC address limits of an EVPN instance are specified using the mac limit and mac threshold-alarm commands.
